channel.title: 70cm on FIDtenas | Open-source RF hardware for Amateur Radio
channel.description: Recent content in 70cm on FIDtenas | Open-source RF hardware for Amateur Radio

item.title: Project Aiga: a portable VHF/UHF antenna optimised for satellite work
item.description: Today, we are glad to present you a very special antenna: Aiga. Aiga is a double band VHF/UHF antenna designed for portable use.

item.title: Raposo-70: redefining 70cm Yagis
item.description: Thanks to the experience obtaing thought the different design stages of Raposo-2, we are glad to annouce the new member to the family: Raposo-70.
